about_the_game:
Supporter Pack

This pack includes profile and vehicle customization options that can be enjoyed in both single-player and multiplayer. The DLC is optional and is being released alongside a free co-op update available for all the Delivery INC players. If you enjoy Delivery INC and want to support further development of our games, then the Supporter Pack is for you!

Profile Customization

Customize your profile in Multiplayer Mode:

  • Change your profile name,
  • Change your profile font style,
  • Change your avatar.

Enhanced Vehicle Customization

Change the entire look of your vehicles by choosing:

  • Alternative skin, including new futuristic variants,
  • New decals with separate customizable colors.

Thank you for your Support

Thank you for supporting Delivery INC! We appreciate the constant support and feedback from our community. Enjoy the new co-op mode together with your friends. Running a small business alone may be easy, but what happens when a partner comes along? Will you be able to cooperate? Or maybe you will start competing? Regardless of your style, we wish you great fun in the new mode in Delivery INC!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Yes
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.6 Ghz, multi-core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Yes
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

name: Delivery INC - Supporter Pack

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 650
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

  • Processor: 2.6 Ghz, multi-core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 10
